meanings.definition: A Middle Eastern salad made with bulgur, tomatoes, parsley, mint, and lemon juice.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious taboulis at the party.
meanings.sent2: She makes the best taboulis in town.
meanings.sent3: The taboulis danced on my taste buds with its fresh flavors.
meanings.sent4: The taboulis was a refreshing oasis in the desert of bland salads.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the taboulis brightened up the table.
